name: Duke's Quest
description: Duke has lost his intel report, and needs someone to get it back.

1.description: Duke told me that the intel report was stolen by goblins.

name: Things get foggy
description: The priest of Stonehaven has sent his young acolyte to deliver a message, but he has not returned. The priest is seeking someone to check on him.

1.description: The priest told me his acolyte hasn't returned. Apparently he was heading south-west, to the village of Eldoria

2.description: I must let the priest know what happened to his acolyte.

3.description: You promised do something about the bandit. I wonder what?

4.description: I killed the bandit. He didn't have the message though. Maybe I should check with the other bandits.

5.description: I took care of the bandits. I should return to the acolyte.

name: The Bandit King
description: The Bandit King has been terrorizing the countryside for years. The king is offering a reward to anyone who can bring him to justice.
